title: Orb card
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                           |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The card depicts a figure surrounded by floating, glowing orbs of energy. |

The Orb card conjures balls of destructive magic - more specifically, [Orbs of Destruction](/Orb_of_destruction "Orb of destruction"). The amount varies by your [invocations](/Invocation "Invocation"); at high power, multiple orbs will encircle the player.

## History

This card used to activate various [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations"), and only at high power did it spawn OODs.

The Orb card could be found in the following [decks](/Decks "Decks") over the past several versions.

| [0.11](/0.11 "0.11")                                                                        | [0.12](/0.12 "0.12")                                                                        | [0.13](/0.13 "0.13")                                                                        | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14")                                                                        | [0.15](/0.15 "0.15")                                                                        | [0.16](/0.16 "0.16")                                      | [0.17](/0.17 "0.17")                                      | [0.18](/0.18 "0.18")                                      | [0.19](/0.19 "0.19") and beyond                           |

html:
Orb card

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
The card depicts a figure surrounded by floating, glowing orbs of energy.

The Orb card conjures balls of destructive magic - more specifically, Orbs of Destruction. The amount varies by your invocations; at high power, multiple orbs will encircle the player.

History

This card used to activate various Conjurations, and only at high power did it spawn OODs.

The Orb card could be found in the following decks over the past several versions.
